Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add component library and Excalidraw-style sketch rendering

This commit implements two major features for WireFlow:

1. Component Library System:
   - Added 6 PM-centric component templates \(Table, Table+Filters, Empty State, Confirmation Modal, Simple Form, Action Footer\)
   - Implemented grouping system for component instances with select, move, and ungroup operations
   - Added ComponentPanel UI with category filtering and click-to-insert functionality
   - Enhanced SidePanel to show group info and ungroup button
   - Extended export format to v3.0.0 with componentType and groupId metadata
   - Keyboard shortcuts: G to ungroup, Delete with confirmation for grouped elements

2. Sketch-Style Rendering:
   - Implemented custom hand-drawn visual style inspired by Excalidraw
   - Added deterministic wobble algorithm using element IDs as seeds
   - Applied sketch rendering to all element types \(rectangles, text, arrows\)
   - Updated selection handles to circular fills
   - Softer color palette \(#6b7280\) with 1.5px rounded strokes
   - Maintains all existing interactions \(select, resize, move, delete\)

Technical details:
   - Segmented line drawing \(3+ segments, 1 per 20px\) with perpendicular wobble
   - No external dependencies - 100% custom rendering logic
   - Performance optimized with useCallback hooks
   - Fixed circular dependency in getGroupElements by moving definition before redraw

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
